item.title: The Franks ft. Natasha
item.description: From Germanic barbarians on the edge of the Empire to running the whole show

item.title: Late Roman Empire
item.description: Like all bad things, the Roman Empire came to an end. But why did it take hundreds of years for that to happen?

item.title: Quo Vadis ft. Maggie
item.description: Set against the back drop of Rome in crisis, General Marcus Vinicius returns to the city as Neroâ€™s atrocities become more extreme until he burns Rome, laying the blame on the Christians.

item.title: Barbarians
item.description: Barbarians is a German historical drama that tells the story of Arminus, a Germanic Barbarian raised in Rome, and sent back to Germania a Roman soldier
